column4: could http://ubuntu.pastebin.com/9zhfMvL7 be related to the cyclone process that I can't seem to kill?  'ps aux' output for cyclone is: dwayne    2753  0.7  0.0      0     0 ?        ZN   Sep09   4:55 [cyclone] <defunct>
a defunct process is just a process that has finished or died or exited in some way, which its parent hasn't reaped
there isn't technically anything wrong with processes showing up as defunct unless more of them keep appearing under the same parent without the old ones disappearing
any chance you can take a look at my dmesg output (http://ubuntu.pastebin.com/9zhfMvL7), this ubuntu system is locking up daily
